transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Yes sir, maine aapne mere customer care number pe phone kar diya regarding aapki services ke bare mein. 
From IndiaMART. Sir kya issue aa raha tha sir aap bataiye?
Customer: Ji mera ek subscription liya hua hai isme.
Haa.
Customer: To ye jaise mujhe ye matlab mera ye bahar ka sirf dikhata hai.
Customer: Wo bhi matlab retail customer ka mujhe matlab main matlab wholesale supply karta hu retail nahi.
Executive: Sir matlab aapki jo leads vagaira ke jo cheeze hai uske bare mein thoda aapko problem hota hai bahar ki lead aati hai aapke pass.
Customer: Ji ji mujhe Assam ka chahiye.
Executive: Accha theek hai. Sir aapke pass mera number sir aapke pass mera number nahi tha aapne customer care pe phone kar diya.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Agar aap sir ek minute main aapka wo jo aapki cheez open kar deti hu.
Executive: Matlab aapke basically problem ye ho rahi hai ki aapko bahar ki lead jyada mil rahi hai aur Assam ki lead nahi aa rahi hai aapke pass.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: To sir aapko Assam mein hi dealing karna hai?
Customer: Ji ji Assam aur West Bengal.
Executive: Assam and West Bengal. Okay.
Executive: Just a minute sir main aapke jo bhi product hai usko ek baar listing dekh leti hu aapki kya hai kya nahi.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai aapke hai inverter ARJ welding machine electric panel vagaira yahi sab aapke product hai?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Sir main aapko ek link share karti hu aap usse join ho sakte ho kya abhi usme hi main discussion karwa deti hu fir aapke sath.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Haa sir maine aapko ek video meet ka link share kara hua hai aap usko join kar lijiye sir.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Haa aapki jo
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is getting leads from outside Assam.

- Wants leads from Assam and West Bengal.



Resolution:

- Executive shared a video meet link.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join the video meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, location
